content: oh hey guys I'm going to start my project out with this skeleton warriors
box from war games factory I've showed you this before and my hard modeling

I'm adding the texture the medium and I'm just going to start sticking the
skeleton pieces in there and I want to get nice adhesion so I'm making sure I'm
pushing that into the the modelling paste and just put them on there
aesthetically you can also add some white glue after you've got all these on
that'll give you some extra adhesion to this so let me say give you a close look
there so there we go we'll paint that up and then I'll show it to you our
adventurers discover this cave but notice these piles of human bones

yeah but we just leave okay yeah let's do that by the case our cowardly

just put some brown on it and some white and just painted up the skeletons the

for your games hey you yeah you back here huh I know it
